mapper.select: SELECT dish.*,element.*,`type`.cafeteria_id as cafeteriaId FROM diet_dish dish LEFT JOIN diet_element element ON dish.id = element.goal_id JOIN his_meal_type `type` ON `type`.id = dish.type_id where dish.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
